channel.title: FTD Events on Fur Trade Days
channel.description: Recent content in FTD Events on Fur Trade Days

item.title: Forms
item.description: Entry forms, event signups, and posters will appear here.

item.title: Reunions
item.description: ​To list your reunion information, email info@furtradedays.com.

item.title: Schedule
item.description: Updated June 28, 2022 — Event times are tentative and subject to change Thursday, July 7, 2022 All Day - Buckskinners primitive camp, open to visitors (3 Miles East, ~8 miles south from Museum of the Fur Trade) 10:30 a.m. - Story Time, Crafts, bread and jerky, and a movie (ages 3-9) (Chadron Public Library, Fifth & Bordeaux) 6-9 p.m. - Bands on Bordeaux - TBD (First Street, between Main & Bordeaux streets)
